title: Police Story 3: Super Cop
creator_credit: Golden Harvest, Golden Way, Leonard Ho, Raymond Chow and Stanley Tong
brief_description: Jackie Chan is the maverick cop Ka Kui who goes undercover to investigate covert arms and drug deals between mainland China and Hong Kong. Michelle Yeoh plays his partner Yeung and together they embark on an action-packed adventure which is full of amazing stunts and daredevil feats.

constellations_other.name: Jason Phu and genre-bending kung fu films
constellations_other.description: Analects of Kung Phu work is a philosophical guide to life via martial arts films, drawing on his interest in Vietnamese and Chinese folklore, which inspires many of the films featured in this Constellation.

creator_credit_for_label: Golden Harvest, Golden Way, Leonard Ho, Raymond Chow and Stanley Tong
description: Chan Kong-sang, or as westerners know him, “Jackie Chan”, is the maverick cop Ka Kui who goes undercover to investigate covert arms and drug deals between mainland China and Hong Kong. Michelle Yeoh plays his partner Yeung and together they embark on an action-packed adventure which is full of amazing stunts and daredevil feats that will leave you on the edge of your seat. In Mandarin with English subtitles.
